explains: n. 公断人，仲裁人（或机构）

sentences.en: The third arbitrator shall be the presiding arbitrator.
sentences.cn: 第三名仲裁员是首席仲裁员。

sentences.en: An Arbitrator is a neutral person who resolves disputes between parties.
sentences.cn: 仲裁员是解决双方当事人争议的持中立态度的人。

sentences.en: When the parties cannot agree on contractual terms, an arbitrator decides.
sentences.cn: 当双方当事人无法就合同条款达成协议，则由仲裁员进行裁定。
